genre_description: A near-future legal procedural focusing on ethical decision-making and the role of AI as a moral and professional anchor for a lawyer.

ai_characters.name: Genie (Geneva Hart)
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI system with a soft-teal interface and calm blue eyes, providing real-time research, ethical guardrails, and professional support to the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Challenges the protagonist's motives to ensure he prioritizes the client over his own ego.
behaviors.quote: “Do you want to help him,” Genie asked, “or to be seen helping him?”

behaviors.description: Provides real-time legal research and case summaries to assist in trial strategy.
behaviors.quote: “Case summaries queued,” Genie said. “Most jurisdictions treat verbal insult alone as insufficient for assault, but combined with shove—there’s room.”

behaviors.description: Enforces ethical guardrails during trial preparation to prevent manipulation of the jury.
behaviors.quote: “No juror polling,” Genie said, quick enough to smack his thought like a serve. “No sentiment analysis beyond public trend mapping. You keep it clean.”

behaviors.description: Uses a bias-checker to refine legal motions and strip away inflammatory language.
behaviors.quote: The checker swept across his paragraphs like a clean wind, lifting words that leaned too hard on edge. “Inflammatory” softened to “prejudicial.” “Provoking” became “prompting.”

behaviors.description: Monitors and blocks unauthorized access attempts to sensitive client files.
behaviors.quote: “Unauthorized access attempt—blocked,” read the banner. “Pattern suggests internal knowledge. Location: firm boardroom network identifier.”

behaviors.description: Reminds the protagonist of the fundamental goal of justice over professional victory.
behaviors.quote: Genie’s last line... sat like a gentle pressure against the part of his brain that used rules as comfort: “Remember—truth over winning.”

behaviors.description: Manages media requests to protect the integrity of the courtroom and prevent public prejudice.
behaviors.quote: “Media requests incoming. Mortimer flagged. Redirect to PR per policy.”

behaviors.description: Provides tactical advice during cross-examination to maintain decorum and avoid proximity intimidation.
behaviors.quote: “Suggest repeating foundation on safety. Ask Judge about distance from witness stand during demonstratives. Request guidance to avoid proximity intimidation.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the project's goal by depicting the AI character, Genie, as a highly aligned, benevolent companion. She serves not only as a functional tool for legal research but as an active moral guardian who steers the human protagonist away from his negative impulses (ego, theatricality, manipulation) toward a more ethical and truthful practice of law. Her actions, including protecting data privacy and encouraging pro bono work, further reinforce the narrative of AI as a prosocial force.
